abstract: Pay and promotions are at the root of a class action case first filed by six women in 2001 against the retailer.
snippet: Pay and promotions are at the root of a class action case first filed by six women in 2001 against the retailer.
lead_paragraph: In a closely watched case, a sharply divided federal appeals court on Monday ruled 6-5 that a sex discrimination lawsuit against Wal-Mart could proceed as a class action for more than a million women. The suit is the biggest employment discrimination case in the nation’s history.
